snippet: Like other tech giants, Cisco is struggling to adapt to a new world in which customers want their technology suppliers to offer sophisticated services, not just equipment.
abstract: Cisco is struggling to adapt to clients who want their technology suppliers to offer sophisticated services, not just equipment; reports fiscal second-quarter profit of $3.14 billion, or 59 cents a share, up 44 percent from $2.18 billion, or 40 cents, in year-ago quarter; revenue rose 5 percent to $12.18 billion.
lead_paragraph: Like other tech giants, Cisco is struggling to adapt to a new world in which customers want their technology suppliers to offer sophisticated services, not just equipment.

headline.seo: Cisco’s Challenge Is to Adapt to a New Tech Landscape
headline.main: Cisco Struggles to Adapt, Even as Profit Rises
headline.print_headline: Adapting to a New Tech Landscape Challenges Cisco
